item.title: Break-up The Right And Nice Ways
item.description: The results of the research above offer some clear strategies for ending a romantic relationship with minimal hurt, pain, and drama. Using them together will give you an even better chance. Therefore, although nothing can completely eliminate some uncomfortable break up moments, following the steps below may help give you a happier ending. Be open, honest, and direct. Set a time that is mutually beneficial and not rushed to talk to your partner face-to-face.

item.title: How To Be Single
item.description: Hi friends, When people ask you how things are going, you tell them “Fine. Everything’s fine.” Because it is. You’ve settled into a nice career, you love your roommate, and you’ve been eating well. Those five pounds you gained in the winter are gone and now you just stare at your flat stomach in the mirror, hoping it will unleash some secret about being happy. Grab the fat and revel in how little there is.

item.title: It's Actually The Way You Say
item.description: Brothers, In communication, especially with women, the gesture and the body language are much more important than the thing we say. Many, many times more. Do you know that, in reality, body language comprises up to 93% of the communication power, while the message is just little 7%. Yes, that is true. Body language is the key factor deciding a winner or loser, not the message my friend. So, what does body language comprise of?

item.title: Honesty Is The Sexiest Charm
item.description: Oh dear, In previous sessions, we have discussed about some fundamental mistakes guys usually make on their journeys to win the ladies of their lives. How about today? I will be talking about Honesty. The Honesty of Men. Well, what makes you think about honesty? Currently how many definitions are there in your own dictionary? Where does honesty stand in your life’s priority? To me, honesty is the key that enables me successes with ladies.

item.title: Men: Don't Make These Mistakes
item.description: My brothers, Let me tell you a story. Last month I had a day trip with my friends and need the mountain bike. But then I realised there was a small problem with the gear of my mountain bike, so I took my tools and tried to fix it (my first attempt ever). Well, I didn’t know why but after a while of trying hard, my bike was totally spoilt.
